title: All Half-Life games
description:
Every Half-Life game ever made.

Includes:
-Half-Life
-Half-Life:Blueshift
-Half-Life:Opposing Force
-Codename Gordon
-Half-Life 2
-Half-Life 2:Episode One
-Half-Life 2:Episode Two
-Half-Life 2:Lost Coast
-Portal


All the games work without steam, no cracks or patches are required.

You will be asked for a CD-Key the first time you run any HL1 game, it's "AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA".

No install is required, just unzip to "C:whole-life" with 7-zip.



Notes:

Half-life includes the high def pack.

Episode 2 has allready been fixed, no missing textures/AI.

The only issue is that it has to be unzipped to "c:whole-life", if it's not the shortcuts wont work.  If you can't/won't unzip to this directory you'll have to edit the shortcuts, or make new ones.
